column4: hello, Im on ubuntu 8.10, with firefox. I have installed adobe-flashplugin, but the test on the official webpage of adobe (http://www.adobe.com/shockwave/welcome/) doesn't work... maybe a link problem? PLease help me. thank you
and if I do about:plugins in firefox, I do not see flash
